channel.title: Please help!

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

You’re missing a signlink class, or a signlink variable.

I don’t have one myself, so I can’t help much there.

Read full topic

item.title: Please help!
